name: A Thief's Quest
description: Christopher J. Teuton is an author, editor, director, and game developer living in Savannah, GA, in the United States. Most recently he was the Lead Gaming Editor at www.screenrant.com for a number of years until he stepped down to pursue more creative endeavors (although he still assists in Talent Acquisition and the occasional game review/feature) and before that his film Je N'ai Pas Dit won 4th place in the 2019 Lift-Off Sessions Film Festival. He has created two other video games; Welcome to Pineview (2016) and The Arys Expedition (2017), as well as physical card games like EN CARDE: A DUELING GAME (2018). A THIEF’S QUEST will be his third completed video game project overall and his first in the RPGMaker MV engine.
